name: SUMEET RAWAT
experience:   VPC: Setup a VPC (Default and custom based), Creating the Subnets (Public/Private), Internet
Gateways, NAT instances, Route Tables, and Network ACLs based on requirements.
  Creating the VPC peering between different VPCs.
  Cloud Watch: Creating Alarms, Monitoring the EC2 with Custom metrics, managing the EC2Actions
like Rebooting, Stopping, Terminating the instances when Alarm changes state.
  S3: Creating buckets and uploading and extracting the objects from S3 buckets. Archiving the things
  EBS: Performing Disk changes like volume attachments, detachments to EC2 instances and creating,
copying and sharing the EBS snapshots.
  Securely controlling AWS users and groups' access to AWS services and resources by using, IAM,
  Deploying, managing and operating scalable and highly available systems on AWS.
